Created

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enum schemas for route parameters are inlined in openapi spec #60789
  • Blazor work doesn't seem to take place within an activity #60788
  • [Identity] Allow Email-Only Authentication Without Mandatory Username Field #60787
  • Improve XML generator for types defined in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity #60783
    Backlog
  • Initialize options of RequestLocalizationMiddleware in Invoke instead of constructor #60780
  • Perf regression: json, json_middleware, mTls-handshakes-kestrel #60778
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #60777
  • Windows hosting bundle upgrade breaks ANCM on ARM64 machines #60764

Closed

  • OpenApi generator messes up $ref of collection item if that type is used multiple times in same response #60779
  • Keyed @inject support #60786
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #60760
  • Perf improvement: json, json_middleware, multiple_queries #60740
  • ASP.NET Core 9 sends response content for HTTP HEAD requests #59691
  • An ASP.NET core application hangs at startup in AKS #60646
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #60773
  • RateLimitingMiddleware test improvements #43298
    Backlog
  • Double-compression when trying to host pre-compressed (`.gz`, `.br`) files via MapStaticAssets #60558
  • Breakpoints not pausing execution in a HTML <select> <option> onchange event #60602

PullRequests

Created

  • Add avif MIME type #60790
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Sync shared code from runtime #60782
    area-runtime
  • Fix ASP.NET Core module installer upgrade issues #60769
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update to Microsoft.OpenApi v2.0.0-preview.11 #60761
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview3
  • Don't send body in HEAD response when using PipeWriter.Advance before headers flushed #59725
    feature-kestrel, area-networking, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Fix OpenAPI server URLs for Aspire scenarios #60673
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0.x
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • Add partitioned to cookie for SignalR browser testing #60728
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Deduplicate assets produced on multiple build legs in the VMR to only be produced on the 'primary' build leg #60792
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix self-referential schema handling in collection schemas #60410
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0.x
  • Support input validation for minimal APIs via generic resolver model #60724
    area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Initial support for persisting component state #60634
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2656907 #60736
    area-mvc
  • Check length of TypeArguments before accessing via index #60742
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Flow the WebAssembly options from Server to client through SSR marker #60714
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview3
  • [Blazor] Opt-in to use dotnet.boot.js #60751
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview3
  • Clarify DefaultPolicy and FallbackPolicy Behavior in XML Docs #60619
    community-contribution, area-security

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Extensions: track more open issues #9201
  • Include 'new' in core scenarios for target-typed static name lookup, and editorial updates #9199

Updated

  • Field nullability revisions #9184
  • Revamp proposal for list patterns on enumerables #9165

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SaveChanges throws exception when SetValues is used and a child object exists in change tracker #35745
  • NetTopologySuite providers can't translate manually built expressions using properties of derived classes defined on a base class #35737
  • Analyzer warnings for string concatenation in raw SQL APIs #35735
    Backlog
  • EF.Property fails after conditional projection of entity into anonymous type #35733
    Backlog

Closed

  • Unknow shadow property state update value after call entry.State = EntityState.Unchanged and SaveChanges() #35734
  • PropertyBuilder<TProperty>.HasDefaultValue<TProperty>(object? value) has stopped working after upgrade to EF Core 9.0.1 #35697
  • TableBuilder.ExcludeFromMigration is not Excluding transitive dependencies #35725
  • Consider using OPENJSON for our JSON scalar access #30981
    Backlog
  • when does ef core DbContext get connection from pool and when to return connection to pool #35732

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for complex type discriminator. #35744
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35741
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35740

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/9.0-staging' => 'release/9.0' #35743
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0-staging' => 'release/8.0' #35742
  • Add support for optional complex types to model building #35614
  • Update branding to 9.0.4 #35739
  • Update branding to 8.0.15 #35738

Updated

  • Use AssemblyLoadContext to load EFC.Design #35527

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `installer/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #20353
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `installer/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #20352
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `installer/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #20351

PullRequests

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #20349
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #20350

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ApplyStyleSheets() Causes Exception: System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute #28235
  • Add tests for Keyboard Scrolling Crash #28234
  • Build is failing when it doest find Simulator #28227
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28226
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Need to provision sign identities on Devdiv Mac's #28222
    Backlog
  • NavigatedFromEventArgs internal properties #28218
  • I9 - Changing the snap point value to Mandatory Single would affect performance on scrolling of other pages. #28213
  • Using CollectionView.EmptyView results in an Exception on Windows #28212
  • [Windows] The Slider and Stepper control does not work in One-Way binding mode with a MultiBinding Converter #28208
  • Build error nightly - Skiasharp - 9.0.50-ci.main.25155.2 #28207
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Add BackgroundImage to Tabbar #28205
  • CultureInfo.DisplayName incorrect on MAUI iOS (Android is ok.) #28204

Closed

  • Android - Navigation Title disappears if Flyout is set to a new window #21645
    Backlog
  • [9.0 SR4 Windows] Flyout Menu Icon disappears from Window Title Bar after Navigation #28130
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Keyboard Scrolling Crash #28140
    .NET 9 SR5
  • MauiEnableXamlCBindingWithSourceCompilation = true + RelativeSource + TapGestureRecognizer does not work #28220
  • Role is not defined for "Balance, personal, Fitness, family and Friends" present in Project screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Project _ScreenReader #27428
    .NET 9 SR5
  • After applying orientation "Family and Friends" project data is not visible: A11y_.NET 9 template_ Project _Orientation #27426
    .NET 9 SR5
  • After applying orientation "Clear all" button is not visible and data present besides to Pie chart is truncating.:A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Orientation #27421
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Binding a text property to the Label affects the scrolling performance on mac #17755
  • Clipping elements in MAUI leads to a degradation in scrolling performance. #19135
  • Very bad performance in net8 compared to net7 when creating views at runtime #19229
  • Similar name is provided for delete button: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #27761
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Incorrect name is provided for "Add Task" button as "Add": A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #27734
    .NET 9 SR5
  • The information provided on mouse hover is not accessible for keyboard-only users: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Home_Keyboard. #26799
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Tooltips Provided for the "Chart" are not descriptive enough: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Chart_Non text content. #26800
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Only color is used to show the data in the chart: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Use of Color. #26801
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Visual label/heading is not provided for the chart: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Home_Labels or Instrunctions. #26802
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Project Section is not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26815
    .NET 9 SR5
  • No name is provided for "checkboxes", "clear" and "New Task" button: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #26816
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Incorrect role is provided tags, icons and Project options as text: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #26817
    .NET 9 SR5
  • No name is provided for Edit fields present in the task screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Proejct_Name Role Value. #26819
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Tags are not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26860
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Project option is not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26861
    .NET 9 SR5
  • No Name is provided for "All color Delete button" in Categories and Tags screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Manage meta_Name Role Value. #26918
    .NET 9 SR5
  • No Name and Role is defined for Icons present in Project screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Name Role Value. #26912
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Incorrect name is defined for Plus(+) button in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name Role Value. #26898
    .NET 9 SR5
  • No name is defined for All cleared button in Task section in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name Role Value. #26896
    .NET 9 SR5
  • For checkboxes present under tasks section ‘Analyze survey results, Develop action plan……” Labels are not associated with check box control”: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Labels or Instructions. #26938
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Talkback is not announcing labels for Name, Description, Category edit fields in Project screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Labels or Instructions. #26911
    .NET 9 SR5
  • On applying resize(Text Size), Save button is getting truncated in Projects screen”: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Resize. #26914
    .NET 9 SR5
  • On applying Resize(Text size) in Projects section "Family and friends card text" is getting truncated: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Resize. #26906
    .NET 9 SR5
  • On applying Resize(Text size) "Organize a Friends Get together" list item in task section is getting truncated: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Resize. #26899
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Talkback is not announcing Selected or deselected for work, personal, health, family and friends buttons in tags section: A11y_.NET 9 template_Project_Screen reader. #26940
    .NET 9 SR5
  • In New project screen Name, category and description fields are not accessible with talkback: A11y_.NET 9 template_Hambureger-Projects Options_Screen Reader. #26916
    .NET 9 SR5

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the version of SkiaSharp used by SVG #28233
    p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] Revert "Fix FlyoutPage ShouldShowToolbarButton when overridden to return false, still shows button in title bar" #28232
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Update with final preview2 versions #28231
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28230
    p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix issue not provision sign identities on Devdiv Mac's #28229
  • [net10.0] Update net10.0 preview3 #28228
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2
  • [Testing] Moved ImageDoesNotLeak test case from Device Test to UI Test #28223
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the OneWayBinding issue with MultiBindingConverter on Slider and Stepper Value #28219
    area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-stepper, partner/syncfusion
  • Annotate `ListStringTypeConverter` for nullability #28217
    community ✨
  • Fixed content update issue when changing the ControlTemplate at runtime for a ContentPage #28216
    community ✨, area-controls-pages, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for border color of the RadioButton is visible in Windows #28214
    community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enable UITest Issue18193 on MacCatalyst #28210
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #28209
    area-navigation, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Revert "Fix FlyoutPage ShouldShowToolbarButton when overridden to return false, still shows button in title bar" #28189
    p/0, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix Crashing issue with keyboard scrolling iOS #28148
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 4 #28105
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 17 #28011
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 16 #27968
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [test] Run Android device tests on linux #28192
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling

Updated

  • [Android & iOS]Fix: GestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed crash in CollectionView on iOS when updating grouped data. #28133
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Buttons with Gradient and ImageSource at the same time: ImageSource doesn't appear - UI Test #27572
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android #28116
    platform/android 🤖, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Simplify test projects and fail faster #27517
    area-testing, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Disabled animation for NavigationBar on initial display #27080
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Improve PropertyMapper performance #28077
    p/0, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] RefreshView Loader Appears Frozen When Used with Shell TabBar - fix #27348
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, area-refreshview
  • SelectionLength property update when entry is focused - fix #26213
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on iOS/Catalyst #27971
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix/workaround iOS stuck device tests #28196
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [CollectionView] Crash occurs when switching CollectionView.IsVisible right after setting ItemsSource #28194
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Made sudo optional for Linux jdk provisioning #28195

  • Improve VisualState order and prevent sticky Focused visual state #27477

  • Replace deprecated iOS OpenUrl #28160

  • Fix Shapes BackgroundColor invalidation #27398
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35905.286 #77453

Updated

  • VB SymbolDisplay.ToDisplayString doesn't use `Optional` keyword when `IncludeDefaultValue` and not `IncludeOptionalBrackets` #77458
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.SymbolDisplay.ToDisplayString() returns "this[]" for C# indexer #14684
    Backlog
  • Suppress No Longer Showing in Error List #74228
    Backlog
  • `for` loop with multiple uninitialized variables no longer compiles #77160
    17.13
  • IDE0058 Not Generated for Expression Bodied Methods #76282
  • .NET Framework: "IDE0059: Remove unnecessary value assignment" is incorrectly shown when assigning value in an is operator and variable is used in a nameof. #76113
  • Unable to outdent #region (and other preprocessor directives) #37575
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Use original names for extension implementation methods #77455
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Include the contents of System.Composition in Setup.Dependencies #77451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add null-conditional-assignment tests. #77450
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update null-conditional-assignment branch from main #77449
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Adds :bulb: `Implement Using Copilot` for `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement field null resilience analysis #77127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extensions: resolve new members like classic extension methods #77423
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete `Dictionary<TKey, TValue>` target type #76502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'ComWrappers.RegisterObjectForInterface' should skip a QI if 'inner' is provided #113239
  • Escape Analysis: Elide an array allocation in BitConverter.GetBytes pattern #113236
  • Question about Sse2 Intrinsics Tests And use of `private static` #113231
  • OpenSSL stores refreshing blocks multiple threads causing lock contention and thread pool exhaustion. #113227
    8.0.x
  • FileSystemWatcher NotifyFilter Not Respected on Linux #113220
  • Weird PublishAot memory differences without actually publishing #113219
  • [API Proposal]: Socket.SendFile{Async} overload with SafeFileHandle #113216
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract does not include Mach-O universal binaries #113215
  • [mono] android crash : mono_generic_class_hash [metadata.c : 1928] #113204
  • [mono] android crash: mono_class_try_get_generic_class [class-accessors.c : 57] #113203
  • [mono] android crash: mono_get_image_for_generic_param [class.c : 2136] #113202
  • [mono] android crash: mono_class_is_open_constructed_type [class.c : 614] #113199
  • [mono] android crash : monoeg_g_hash_table_lookup [ghashtable.c : 321] #113198
  • [mono] android crash : monoeg_g_hash_table_insert_replace [ghashtable.c : 243] #113197
  • [mono] android crash: sgen_client_par_object_get_size [sgen-client-mono.h : 159] #113196
  • [mono] android crash #113195
  • Better supporting memory management in cgroup hierarchy #113193
  • Stack Overflow Exception in System.Private.CoreLib.DLL #113189
  • Specialize BinaryReader for UnmanagedMemoryStream similar to MemoryStream specialization #113187
  • Unexpected Behavior with SafeEvpPKeyHandle.OpenSsl.cs on Mac OS Sonoma 14.4.1 #113186

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] FormatException instead of ArgumentException in MethodBase.GetMethodFromHandle #113016
  • System.NotSupportedException: No data is available for encoding 1252 in .NET Core #113059
    10.0.0
  • When min major R2R version moves forward, consider some cleanups #98871
    Future
  • [Behaviour Proposal]: Allow resolving keyed dependencies without FromKeyedServicesAttribute #105913
    10.0.0
  • Intermittent SIGILL on build, restore and/or publish #112605
  • API Proposal: Thread.JoinAsync #40574
  • ManagedError: EndOfStringNotFound when starting Blazor in BlazorWebAssembly application with AoT #111151
    8.0.x
  • [mono] bug about wasm single thread using lock #112734
    10.0.0
  • ASP.NET Core - Getting model attribute parameter with attributes always crashes with invalid cast exception #113173
  • Wrong IServiceProvider instance in AddHttpClient callback #113200
  • [mono] android crash: mono_get_image_for_generic_param [class.c : 2136] #113201
  • [NativeAOT] don't generate __GetFieldHelper if struct is never boxed? #111544
    Future
  • Could not load file or assembly or one of its dependencies in PowerShell Module project target to netstandard 2.0 #113006

PullRequests

Created

  • Update dotnet-sos version #113240
    needs-area-label
  • Fix LdapConnection with AuthType.External #113238
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [APX] Complete EGPR encoding in X64 backend #113237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix edge likelihoods in `fgOptimizeBranch` #113235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Backport #113095: Better ARM intrinsics implementation for dn_simdhash #113234
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label, 9.0.x
  • Bounds checks: make MergeEdgeAssertions more precise #113233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test that AppContext.BaseDirectory is rooted #113232
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Back port logical equivalent of #102838 #113230
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Fix providers EC export and key derivation with newer OpenSSL and add TLS with TPM keys tests #113229
    area-System.Security
  • Fixed some typos in the document: Implementation of Hardware Intrinsics in CoreCLR #113228

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Problem with boxing in resume stub when return type is a struct instantiated over object type #3010

PullRequests

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from upstream #3030

Merged

  • [Swift Bindings] Initialized static properties support #3028
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Start running the wasi library tests #3027

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

PullRequests

Created
